Headline: Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/North
ShortDescription: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ridgeland, North Ave, Austin, Grand: due to street blockage near Narragansett/North.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ridgeland, North Ave, Austin, Grand and the resume their normal route at  Narragansett, due to street blockage near Narragansett/North.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green and Pink Line Service Experiencing Significant Delays Due to Raised Bridge
ShortDescription: Green and Pink Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green and Pink Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown.

Shuttle buses are available between Clinton and Clark/Lake to provide connecting service.

Some trains may be held or turned back before reaching the bridge in order to maintain service across the remainder of the route. Listen for announcements and check train destination signs when boarding.

We apologize for this temporary inconvenience and appreciate your patience while the Chicago Department of Transportation works to complete the bridge lift operation. 
Allow extra travel time.
